title: EUNE Register doest work..
body:
From around 1 week i am trying to make a new acc bcs i am getting pretty much deadbored and pretty sad watching ranked games but everytime i try it took me FOREVER litterily to see if the account is possible to make i leave it for 1, 2 hours nothing at all
I dont know how much time it took to be fixed its like this from around a week at least from this much time i am trying
If anyone knows why is it like that just comment down bellow...
Tell me if you need some spec..

replies.body: The most common cases of account registration failure would be using an existing email or inputting an age that is not eligible for creation.  Let me know if that clears things up!

So i make a new acc i am from bulgaria so i use an ABV  the age i know about it i put pretty much random ages from 2000 down bcs there is not much of an deal ..
But the part is that i meant it not even wanna scan you just put the info and it stops working like it become frozen.
Oh yea also i am doing it wtih chrome.
how it looks like : https://gyazo.com/cc03d7293dcc252db0e1682c2f624de3

Your best bet would be to reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our account team can look into any potential blocks and help out with creation.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can!
